channel.title: Releases on WAHA

item.title: WAHA 2026.1 - Per-Session API Keys, GOWS Storage Toggle
item.description:
ðŸ” Per-Session API Keys

You can now scope API keys to specific sessions instead of the whole server. This helps isolate tenants, rotate access, and keep automation scoped to the right WhatsApp session.

item.title: WAHA 2025.12 - Custom Device Names, Calls Automation
item.description:
ðŸ·ï¸ Custom Device Name

You can now label a session so it shows up with a friendly name under WhatsApp â†’ Linked Devices. Configure the deviceName once and keep your fleet easy to identify.

item.title: WAHA 2025.11 - Auto Presence, Leaner GOWS
item.description:
âœ… Presence â€“ Auto Online

Presence now sets you online when you do anything via the API, then returns to offline after a few seconds. Dashboards stay correct, and your phone still receives notifications.

item.title: WAHA 2025.10 - ChatWoot Pull Commands, Secure Defaults
item.description:
ðŸ’¬ ChatWoot â€“ Messages Sync

Need old conversations inside ChatWoot? Run wa/messages pull to replay WhatsApp chat history, pick the time range, fetch media, and even close conversations during the import. Every switch is explained in the ðŸ’¬ ChatWoot â€“ Messages Guide.

item.title: WAHA 2025.9 - ChatWoot 1.1, NOWEB 7.0-rc, Sessions Filters
item.description:
ðŸ§© ChatWoot 1.1

ChatWoot integration graduates to v1.1, adding conversation control, CSAT surveys, richer language templates, and safer contact handling.

item.title: WAHA 2025.8 - Ignore Chats, Send Poll Vote, and more!
item.description:
ðŸ–¥ï¸ Sessions - Ignore Chats

You can now ignore incoming chats at the engine level â€” Status, Groups, and Channels â€” to keep your processing focused and clean.

item.title: WAHA 2025.7 - ChatWoot App, Dashboard i18n, and more!
item.description:
ðŸ§© ChatWoot App

Meet the first built-in app in WAHA - ðŸ§© ChatWoot App!

WAHA now provides a built-in app to integrate your WhatsApp account with ChatWoot, eliminating the need to run n8n or use other third-party products!

item.title: WAHA 2025.6 - Security in WAHA Core, Message Edit Event, and Media Conversion
item.description:
ðŸ†• What’s New?

ðŸ”’ Security in WAHA Core

WAHA Core now comes with robust, built-in security features!
You can protect your API with an API Key - and now, for even greater security, you can store only the hash of your key using WAHA_API_KEY=sha512:{HASH}.
This means your API key is never stored in plain text, reducing the risk if your environment variables are exposed.

âœ… Presence (WEBJS)

In WEBJS, you can now use the âœ… Presence API and Events to track your customers’ online status!
